messages.body:
Hi there,

I'm trying to integrate your API with my mobile app but I'm getting a CORS error. I've added the origin to my app settings as specified in the documentation, but it's still not working.

Here are the details:
- App URL: https://myapp.example.com
- Error message: 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin header is missing'
- API endpoint I'm trying to access: /v1/products

I've double-checked all the settings in my developer dashboard. Is there something else I need to configure?

Thanks for your help!
Mark

Hi Mark,

Thanks for reaching out about the CORS issue. I can help you resolve this. Could you please verify these additional settings in your developer dashboard:

1. Check if you've included the full URL including the protocol (https://)
2. Ensure you've saved the changes after adding the origin
3. Wait a few minutes for the changes to propagate

If you're still experiencing issues, could you share your request headers? This will help us identify the root cause.

Best regards,
David
